One day, she discovers a magical birthday party assistant who is invisible to everyone except her.
The invisible birthday party assistant helps her plan and execute the party, making sure that everything runs smoothly and that all of her guests are happy.
The girl is amazed by the invisible birthday party assistant's ability to make everything happen without her even having to ask.
She invites her friends over and they are all amazed by the seamless party planning and execution.
The invisible birthday party assistant continues to help her with future parties, making sure that they are always a success.
